general.description: Old King Cole's moon Sanchez is a rather dirty place. Being the only pirate hold for some distance helps with this, as well as being a little small for the duty. The local clanworld tries to make up for the lack with exploiting the resources from the other planets in system.
general.bar: The bar is quiet and orderly, with a few deals going down in closed-off booths, nice food, and only the occasional drunken brawl. The lord of Shanchez doesn't appreciate louts, it seems.
